Distributor *may* distribute the Products to existing and new customers of Distributor located in the Territory (the "End-Users") who enter into an End-User License Agreement (as hereinafter defined). perturbation.explanation: By changing 'hereby grants' to 'may grant' and 'shall distribute' to 'may distribute', the exclusivity of the distribution license is weakened. It is no longer a guaranteed right, creating uncertainty regarding the extent of the distributor's rights. The Distributor's right is no longer guaranteed.
